remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要定义单元格，指定的。To define a for a cell, specify a of . A可以应用于表、 列或单元格级别上的单元格。A can be applied to a cell at the table, column, or cell level. 要应用于列中的所有单元格，设置属性，它将优先于属性。To apply a to all cells in a column, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. 要应用到单个单元格，设置属性直接基于对象，将优先于所有其他适用于单元格的样式。To apply a to an individual cell, set the property directly on the object, which takes precedence over all other styles that you apply to the cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置该列相对于 中其他列的显示位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the .

value.span: 当列显示在关联的 中时，该列从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column, as it is displayed in the associated .

value.span: 注册的默认值为-1。

span.span: The registered default is -1.

value.span: 有关可能影响该值的因素的信息，请参见 。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性具有默认值为-1 添加到之前集合。The property has a default value of -1 before it is added to the collection. 列添加到将更新此值。This value is updated when the column is added to the . 要求每个列的属性必须是从 0 到的唯一整数的-1。The requires that the property of each column must be a unique integer from 0 to the of -1. 因此，当一列更改时，更改通常会导致的其他列，还可以更改。Therefore, when the of one column changes, the change typically causes the of other columns to also change. 上的限制由强制执行值机制。The restrictions on the value are enforced by a mechanism. 如果你尝试设置一个值，不是有效，则会引发一个运行时异常。If you attempt to set a value that is not valid, a run-time exception is thrown. 时的值属性更改，引发事件。When the value of the property is changed, the event is raised.

span.span: The style object to apply to the column header during a drag operation.

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

value.span: 有关可能影响该值的因素的信息，请参见 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性设置为单个列中。Use this property to set the for an individual column in the . 若要定义对于拖动指示器中，指定的。To define a for the drag indicator, specify a of . 可以在要更改的外观的某些元素的拖动指示器，如列标题的边框的样式来设置属性。You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header. 但是，拖动指示器的默认模板使用来绘制原始列标题所拖动的映像。However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a to paint a with an image of the original column header that is being dragged. 因此，如果你设置某些属性在样式中，如或，它们将显示不会应用。As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as or , they will appear to not be applied. 若要更改列标题的外观进行拖动时，应用新模板不使用默认值。To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default .

A可应用到所有列标题或单个列标题。A can be applied to all column headers or to an individual column header. 要应用设置为一个单独的标头，属性，它将优先于属性。To apply a to an individual header, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用样式资源更改中的列标题样式。The following example uses a style resource to change the style of column headers in the . 然后，将第一个列标题的样式设置与以内联样式重写。The style of the first column header is then set with an inline style that overrides the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能用于冻结列。 cannot be used to freeze a column. 与此相反，设置属性。Instead, set the property. 最高为指定的列的最左侧列数将就地冻结。The leftmost columns up to the column that is specified by the number will freeze in place. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从选择"冻结的列"时冻结列。The following example shows how to freeze a column when "Freeze Column" is selected from the . 若要包括在冻结的列，向左移动列。Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`在单个列中进行的所有单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 设置属性`true`进行中的所有单元格只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only. 设置属性`true`以使单个单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 如果在设置之间存在冲突，列或单元格级别，值为`true`优先于值为`false`。If a conflict exists between the settings at the , column, or cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为每个选定的单元格，以检索默认单元格内容调用此方法。This method is called for each selected cell to retrieve the default cell content. 然后，它会发出事件。It then raises the event. 你可以处理要返回前修改单元格内容的事件。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is returned.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPastingCellClipboardContent(object item, object cellContent) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub OnPastingCellClipboardContent (item As Object, cellContent As Object)
public: virtual void OnPastingCellClipboardContent(System::Object ^ item, System::Object ^ cellContent);

param.name: item
param.span: 选定元素的数据上下文。

span.span: The data context for the selected element.

param.name: cellContent
param.span: 要粘贴到单元格中的内容。

span.span: The content to paste into the cell.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用作程序的帮助程序，如果你提供的自定义粘贴实现。This method can be used as a helper if you provide a custom paste implementation for the . 单元格内容存储在`item`对象。The cell content is stored in the `item` object. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. 你可以处理要修改的单元格内容，然后粘贴该单元格中的事件。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is pasted into the cell. 你可以设置`cellContent`到`null`取消粘贴操作。You can set `cellContent` to `null` to cancel the paste action.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event PastingCellClipboardContent As EventHandler(Of DataGridCellClipboardEventArgs)

summary.span: 在剪贴板内容传输到单元格之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the clipboard content is moved to the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序可以修改剪贴板内容，然后将它获取存储在单元格内容。Event handlers can modify the clipboard content before it gets stored in the cell content.

span.span: This implementation returns in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的列类型重写此方法以响应由用户手势`editingEventArgs`并编辑之前返回的当前值。Derived column types override this method to respond to the user gesture that is indicated by `editingEventArgs` and to return the current value before editing.
